trans-unit.source: Provides conduits for messages that cross remoting boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 为跨远程处理边界的消息提供管道。

trans-unit.source: Remoting boundaries can be <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>s, <xref:System.AppDomain>s, processes, or computers.
trans-unit.target: 远程处理边界可以是<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>s， <xref:System.AppDomain>s、 进程或计算机。

trans-unit.source: An application can cross these boundaries only by using channels.
trans-unit.target: 只能通过使用通道，应用程序可以跨这些边界。

trans-unit.source: These crossings can be inbound and outbound.
trans-unit.target: 这些交叉可以是入站和出站。

trans-unit.source: A channel can listen on an endpoint for inbound messages, send to an endpoint for outbound messages, or both.
trans-unit.target: 通道可以侦听终结点上的入站消息，将发送给出站消息，还是两者都的终结点。

trans-unit.source: This provides an extensibility point in the runtime to plug in a wide range protocols, even though the runtime might not be at the other end of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了在运行时中插入范围广泛的协议，一个扩展点，即使运行时可能不是在另一端的通道。

trans-unit.source: Run-time objects can be used to represent a wide and rich set of semantics and entities.
trans-unit.target: 运行时对象可用于表示宽丰富的语义和实体集。

trans-unit.source: The channel provides the extensibility point to convert the messages to and from the specific protocols.
trans-unit.target: 通道提供要将消息转换与特定协议的扩展点。

trans-unit.source: If there are runtimes at both ends of the channel, a virtual channel is created between the two ends, in order to connect the client and server sink chains on either side of the boundary.
trans-unit.target: 如果有在两个通道端的运行时，两个端点，若要连接的边界任何一侧的客户端和服务器接收器链之间创建虚拟通道。

trans-unit.source: The client part of the channel is located at the end of a client context sink chain.
trans-unit.target: 通道的客户端部分是位于客户端上下文接收器链的结尾。

trans-unit.source: The server part of the channel is located at the start of the server context sink chain.
trans-unit.target: 通道的服务器部分位于服务器上下文接收器链的起点。

trans-unit.source: Messages are delivered to the client channel using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> interface, travel through the channel, and are then received by the server channel.
trans-unit.target: 消息传递到客户端通道使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink>接口、 消息通过该信道并且然后通过服务器通道接收。

trans-unit.source: The server channel delivers the message to the first server context sink.
trans-unit.target: 服务器通道将消息传送至第一个服务器上下文接收器。

trans-unit.source: Channels must expose the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel> interface, which provides informational properties such as the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel.ChannelName%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel.ChannelPriority%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通道必须公开<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel>接口，提供信息性的属性，如<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel.ChannelName%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel.ChannelPriority%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Channels can be registered using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.RegisterChannel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用注册通道<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.RegisterChannel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 获取信道的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 信道的名称。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 获取该信道的优先级。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the priority of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 指示信道优先级的整数。

trans-unit.source: Higher numbers indicate higher priority, so a channel with priority of 50 has a higher priority than a channel with priority 25.
trans-unit.target: 较高的数字指定更高的优先级，以使具有优先级 50 的通道的优先级高于通道使用优先级为 25。

trans-unit.source: The cross application domain channel has a priority of 100.
trans-unit.target: 跨应用程序域的信道的优先级为 100。

trans-unit.source: Client channels with higher priority are given the first chance to connect to a remote object specified by a URL or a particular channel data entry from a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>.
trans-unit.target: 优先级较高的客户端通道可以连接到指定的 URL，也可以从一个特定通道的数据项的远程对象的第一个机会<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>。

trans-unit.source: For server channels, the priority indicates the order in which their channel data will appear in a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>, which in turn affects the order in which clients will try to connect to the server object.
trans-unit.target: 对于服务器信道，优先级指示将在其中其通道数据显示中的顺序<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef>，这反过来会影响客户端将尝试连接到服务器对象的顺序。

trans-unit.source: If the server is listening on an HTTP channel with priority 50 and a TCP channel with priority 25 and the client has registered both an HTTP and TCP channel, then the client will use the HTTP channel to talk to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器正在侦听具有优先级 50 一个 HTTP 通道以及具有优先级为 25 的 TCP 通道，并且客户端已注册了 HTTP 和 TCP 通道，则客户端将使用 HTTP 通道与服务器通信。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The URL of the object.
trans-unit.target: 该对象的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the object URI.
trans-unit.target: 当该方法返回时，包含持有对象 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object URI as an out parameter, and the URI of the current channel as the return value.
trans-unit.target: 将对象 URI 返回为输出参数，将当前信道的 URI 返回为返回值。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the current channel, or <see langword="null" /> if the URI does not belong to this channel.
trans-unit.target: 当前信道的 URI，或者如果 URI 不属于该信道，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
